txt.en: Leave Borhador and face whatever is pounding upon the walls of the Crossing-hall.
Borhador stands outside the Crossing-hall.\n\nYou should speak with Borhador.
Leave Borhador and face whatever is pounding upon the walls of the Crossing-hall.
'I saw strength in my people today and the strength of this Vale. How did I not see it before?'
Leave Borhador and face whatever is pounding upon the walls of the Crossing-hall
The townspeople of Ethring band together to overthrow a rampaging cave troll
The sound gets louder, rattling the doors
Borhador hears a loud noise outside and want you to investigate as he fears the a cave troll has come for him.
The townspeople of Ethring band together to overthrow a rampaging cave troll
Leave Borhador and face whatever is pounding upon the walls of the Crossing-hall
Borhador heard sounds coming from outside the hall.\n\nYou should speak with Borhador.

'You hear it, too. The sounds grow with each passing minute. I fear the town is under siege! My time has come. This is surely the end of days!' 

Borhador begins to weep.

'Leave my hall. It is to be my tomb!'
